description: Middleware that extracts { block-s } from pages and sends them as JSON. This allows the clients update parts of the pages, which is useful for Ajax apps and sites using History.PushState.        If mypage has { block main_content } in the template, make a request mypagepartialmain_content, and youll receive a JSON {main_content ...}.        The example Django project in the BitBucket contains a working JavaScript module that handles these requests and does something more.
